LanguageData.Archipelago.label: archipelago
LanguageData.Archipelago.description: A network of several small islands dotting the coast.
LanguageData.Basin.label: basin
LanguageData.Basin.description: A natural depression in a mountain range, in which groundwater feeds a small lake.
LanguageData.Bay.label: bay
LanguageData.Bay.description: A large indentation in the coastline that provides shelter from strong coastal winds.
LanguageData.CaveLakes.label: cave pools
LanguageData.CaveLakes.description: Small bodies of water can be found within caves in this area.
LanguageData.Cavern.label: cavern
LanguageData.Cavern.description: A network of caves formed by various geological processes.
LanguageData.Chasm.label: chasm
LanguageData.Chasm.description: Geological movement has caused deep fissures in this mountain.
LanguageData.Cliffs.label: cliffs
LanguageData.Cliffs.description: Steep cliffs surround three sides of this area.
LanguageData.CoastalAtoll.label: coastal atoll
LanguageData.CoastalAtoll.description: An island surrounding a large lagoon. There's very little land to build on here.
LanguageData.CoastalIsland.label: coastal island
LanguageData.CoastalIsland.description: A large island near the shore.
LanguageData.Cove.label: bay
LanguageData.Cove.description: A large indentation in the coastline that provides shelter from strong coastal winds.
LanguageData.Crevasse.label: crevasse
LanguageData.Crevasse.description: A massive rift created by glacial movement.
LanguageData.DryLake.label: dry lake
LanguageData.DryLake.description: The remains of a former lake.
LanguageData.Dunes.label: dunes
LanguageData.Dunes.description: A barren expanse of sand. This area is extremely inhospitable.
LanguageData.Fertile.label: fertile
LanguageData.Fertile.description: This area contains more fertile soil than normal.
LanguageData.Fjord.label: fjord
LanguageData.Fjord.description: A long, narrow sea inlet surrounded by steep terrain.
LanguageData.Headwater.label: headwater
LanguageData.Hollow.label: hollow
LanguageData.Hollow.description: A small open area surrounded by cliffs.
LanguageData.HotSprings.label: hot springs
LanguageData.HotSprings.description: A hot water spring, heated by geothermal activity.
LanguageData.Iceberg.label: iceberg
LanguageData.Iceberg.description: A floating mass of ice, detached from the larger ice sheet.
LanguageData.IceCaves.label: ice caves
LanguageData.IceCaves.description: Small cave networks can be found within the ice.
LanguageData.IceDunes.label: ice dunes
LanguageData.IceDunes.description: Massive rolling hills made from compacted windswept snow.
LanguageData.Lake.label: lake
LanguageData.Lake.description: A large body of fresh water.
LanguageData.Lakeshore.label: lakeshore
LanguageData.LakeWithIsland.label: lake with island
LanguageData.LakeWithIsland.description: A large body of fresh water encircles one or more islands.
LanguageData.LakeWithIslands.label: lake with island
LanguageData.LakeWithIslands.description: A large body of fresh water encircles one or more islands.
LanguageData.LavaCaves.label: lava caves
LanguageData.LavaCaves.description: Small lava-filled cave networks can be found here.
LanguageData.LavaCrater.label: lava lake
LanguageData.LavaCrater.description: A lake of deep lava terrain surrounded by volcanic rock.
LanguageData.LavaFlow.label: lava flow
LanguageData.LavaFlow.description: The surrounding landscape routinely funnels large amounts of lava into this area, making it extremely inhospitable.
LanguageData.LavaLake.label: lava lake
LanguageData.LavaLake.description: A lake of deep lava terrain surrounded by volcanic rock.
LanguageData.Marshy.label: marshy
LanguageData.Marshy.description: Patches of marsh break up this area.
LanguageData.MixedBiome.label: mixed biome
LanguageData.MixedBiome.description: This area is at the boundary of two distinct biomes and has elements of both.
LanguageData.Muddy.label: muddy
LanguageData.Muddy.description: This area is muddier than normal.
LanguageData.Oasis.label: oasis
LanguageData.Oasis.description: A lush spring featuring abundant plant life and water.
LanguageData.Peninsula.label: peninsula
LanguageData.Peninsula.description: An outcropping of land surrounded by ocean.
LanguageData.Plateau.label: plateau
LanguageData.Plateau.description: A small rise with sharp cliffs and a flat top.
LanguageData.Pond.label: pond
LanguageData.Pond.description: A small body of fresh water.
LanguageData.RiverConfluence.label: river confluence
LanguageData.RiverDelta.label: delta
LanguageData.RiverDelta.description: A river splitting into many branches as it enters the ocean.
LanguageData.RiverIsland.label: river island
LanguageData.RiverIsland.description: A river splitting into two and then merging again.
LanguageData.Sandy.label: sandy
LanguageData.Sandy.description: Large patches of sand are scattered throughout this area.
LanguageData.TerraformingScar.label: terraforming scar
LanguageData.TerraformingScar.description: A misaligned blast from an ancient terraforming device has warped the earth into serpentine spirals. The area has since recovered, though the twisted and deformed hills remain.
LanguageData.ToxicLake.label: toxic lake
LanguageData.ToxicLake.description: A body of water that has been poisoned by chemicals leaching out of the ground. The water will cause toxic buildup.
LanguageData.Valley.label: valley
LanguageData.Valley.description: A steep valley carved through a mountain.
LanguageData.Wetland.label: wetland
LanguageData.Wetland.description: Large interconnected waterways dominate the area.
